metadata.title: Gilbins Fashion Lightweight Metallic Fring Bridal Shawl Wrap Prom Weddings Evening Scarfs
features: Material: 100% Polyester.Hand wash in cold water, tumble dry for long lasting performance.
Measures Approximately 82" by 19", Fringes 7". Are Available in Many Gorgeous Colors
High Quality Material.Can be worn long, doubled around the neck, or draped over the shoulders.

This women's evening wrap makes a perfect gift and lends that touch of class to any outfit. Great for any time of year this fashion wrap will make you look and feel beautiful and confident for any occasion or event. This fashion wrap is available at deeply discounted pricing. Perfect for a party wrap, prom wrap, wedding, bridal & bridesmaid wraps, & a unique gift idea too. Buy it now and save big!
Perfect Gift for Mothers Day, Christmas Lightweight & Comfortable
description: Bridal Shawl Wrap Very stylish For Special Occasions,Measures Approximately 82" by 19", Fringes 7".
